abstract: With the deal on the line, BP and Rosneft pushed back the deadline for their share swap agreement to May 16 from April 14.
snippet: With the deal on the line, BP and Rosneft pushed back the deadline for their share swap agreement to May 16 from April 14.
lead_paragraph: With the deal looking tenuous, BP and Rosneft agreed to extend the deadline for their share swap agreement — pushing back the date to May 16 from April 14.

headline.main: BP and Rosneft Extend Deal Deadline
